TOOLTIPS.TITLE: Title of the Announcement
TOOLTIPS.TITLE.CRITERIA: Title of the Announcement, Wildcard supported: *
TOOLTIPS.WORKSPACE: Workspace for which the announcement should be applied.
TOOLTIPS.APPLICATION: Application for which the announcement should be applied.
TOOLTIPS.START_DATE: Date and Time on which the announcement becomes active
TOOLTIPS.START_DATE_RANGE: Date range of the start date
TOOLTIPS.END_DATE: Date and Time on which the announcement becomes inactive
TOOLTIPS.END_DATE_RANGE: Date range of the end date
TOOLTIPS.CONTENT: The text of the displayed announcement

ERRORS.INVALID_DATE_RANGE: The start date is after the end date. It must be before that.
ERRORS.PATTERN_ERROR: Your input does not match the required pattern
